content: space - round 3 finished round 5 skip all wide v-double_crochet and single_crochet round 4 skip round 3 work behind in sts and chain sps from round 2 with new color stand single_crochet in a ch3 space following any single_crochet *single_crochet in with new color stand wide v in 2nd skip single_crochet from any same chain space ch1 puff ch1 3 times in next wide v-chain space 3-single_crochet-group from round 2 *ch3 single_crochet in ch7 space from round 2 2 single_crochet in next ch3 space ch2 single_crochet in next chain space* repeat from between the 6th and 7th double_crochet of the petal ch3 wide v in * to * around omitting the last single_crochet close with a slip_stitch in first 2nd single_crochet from next 3-single_crochet-group* repeat from * to * st and cut yarn 3 puff 4 single_crochet 4 ch1 space per side 1 corner around omitting the last wide v close with a slip_stitch in first ch2 space st and cut yarn 4 wide v 4 single_crochet 8 ch3 space round 6 skip all puff - round 4 beginning with new color stand double_crochet in first single_crochet of any side *double_crochet in next st double_crochet in next chain space ch1 2 single_crochet in next ch1 space ch1 twice double_crochet in next ch1 space double_crochet in next 2 st ch1 double_crochet ch2 double_crochet in picot from round 3 ch1 skip ch2 space behind double_crochet in next single_crochet* repeat from * to * around omitting the last double_crochet close with a slip_stitch in first st and cut yarn 8 double_crochet 4 single_crochet 5 ch1 space per side 1 corner ch2 space - round 6 finished - round 4 finished ____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ design by © koernerklaus august 2025 it s not allowed to sell or publish this pattern or parts of it no uploading on social media copyright is mine round 7 with new color stand single_crochet in any corner ch2 space ch2 round 8 with new color stand single_crochet in any corner ch2 space ch2 single_crochet single_crochet in same chain space *single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next chain space single_crochet in in same chain space *single_crochet in each st across single_crochet ch2 single_crochet in next next 3 st fpdc around the top of first puff from corner ch2 space* repeat from * to * around omitting the round 5 directly below skip ch1 space and next single_crochet single_crochet in next st last corner stitches close with a slip_stitch in first st and cut yarn fphdc around the top of next puff from round 5 skip ch1 space 19 single_crochet per side 1 corner ch2 space single_crochet in next st fpdc around the top of next puff from round 5 skip next single_crochet and ch1 space single_crochet in next 3 st single_crochet in next chain space single_crochet in next st single_crochet ch2 single_crochet in next corner ch2 space* repeat block your square if necessary from * to * around omitting the last corner stitches close with a slip_stitch in first st and
